item.title: Weekday Takeaway
item.description: Weekday Takeaway Menu The takeaway service is only from 5.30pm - 7.30pm Burgers & Sausages Bacon Double Cheese Burger £7.00 Beef Burger £3.00 Cheese Burger £3.50 Southern Chicken Burger £5.00 Southern Chicken Bacon/Cheese Burger £7.00 Spicy Bean Burger(vg) £6.00 From the Sea Please note that fish may contain bones.

item.title: Sunday Takeaway
item.description: Sunday Takeaway Menu The takeaway service is from 12pm - 2.30pm (orders must be made by 2pm Saturday) Roasts Half Roast Chicken (on the bone) £12.00 Roast Beef £13.00 Roast Lamb £13.50 Pumpkin, Mushroom & Chestnut Roast (v/gf) £10.50 Mushroom, Brie,Hazelnut & Cranberry Wellington £13.50 All Sunday Roasts come with roast potatoes, roast parsnips, homemade Yorkshire Pudding, sage & onion stuffing, cauliflower cheese, and a selection of vegetables.

item.title: Tier 3: Takeaway Service Only
item.description: Due to the tier system restrictions we are only able to provide a takeaway service at this time.

item.title: Opening Times
item.description: Bar Monday - Tuesday Closed Wednesday - Saturday 12:00 - 2:30pm 5:30 - 10:00pm Sunday 12:00 - 4:30pm Christmas Eve 12:00 - 10:00pm Christmas Day Closed New Years Eve 12:00 - 10:00pm New Years Day 12:00 - 10:00pm Dining-In No bookings for past 8pm please.

COVID-19 Tier Restrictions Current COVID-19 Tier hospitality restrictions are putting particular pressure on our little village pub due to its limited availability of dining tables. In an attempt to attain viable trade, balanced with customer safety regulations, we have been forced to implement the following provisional dining-in terms: Booking It is strongly advised that you pre-books tables, especially on Friday evening, Saturday evening and the Sunday Lunch services. Booking terms & conditions will be explained at the time of booking.

COVID-19 Tier Restrictions Christmas Day and New Years Eve Current COVID-19 Tier hospitality restrictions are putting particular pressure on our little village pub due to its limited availability of dining tables. In an attempt to attain viable trade, balanced with customer safety regulations, we have been forced to implement the following provisional dining-in terms: Sittings From 5.00pm must be booked for either food or drinks; tables are bookable in two-hour slots with the main food services operating two sittings.
